subject: Football
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: Terrell Thomas, who missed last season with the Giants because of a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee, reinjured the ligament Sunday and will probably have surgery.
snippet: Terrell Thomas, who missed last season with the Giants because of a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee, reinjured the ligament Sunday and will probably have surgery.
